name: Certifi
overview:
Certifi is an industry-leading healthcare software and services company with over a century of combined experience in health data information management and services, application development, data architecture, benefits compliance and business optimization.

Certifi has created the first consolidated billing, payment and accounting SaaS designed specifically for health care purchasing exchanges, both public and private.

Among other clients, Certifi performs all financial services for the Utah Health Exchange. Current installations of this software, branded WilliamTM, create over 8 million billing transactions per month.

Other SaaS offerings from Certifi include benefit data auditing, including Dependent Auditing.
